meanings.definition: A cigarette containing a mixture of tobacco and marijuana.
meanings.sent1: I saw him smoking one of those spliffs behind the school.
meanings.sent2: She rolled a couple of spliffs for the party last night.
meanings.sent3: The room filled with the sweet smell of spliffs, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The spliffs burned slowly, like a tiny campfire in his hand.
meanings.sent5: The police officer recognized the distinct aroma of spliffs immediately.

meanings.definition: To roll and smoke a spliff.
meanings.sent1: He spliffs every evening after work to relax.
meanings.sent2: They spliffed together while chatting about their day.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spliffed with the wrong end of the cigarette.
meanings.sent4: The smoke from the spliff curled lazily towards the ceiling.
meanings.sent5: Spliffing in the park, they enjoyed the warm sun on their faces.
